v.v: Their children will prosper in their land;
For those who honor God, it is as if a light were shining on them in the darkness,
Things will go well for those who generously lend money to others
Righteous people will not be overwhelmed because of their troubles;
They are not afraid when they receive bad news;
They are confident and not afraid
They give things generously to poor people;
Wicked people see those things and are angry;

v: How fortunate are those who have an awesome respect for him,
those who happily obey his commands.
and their righteous deeds will endure forever.
on those who are kind, merciful and righteous.
and who conduct their businesses honestly.
other people will always treasure their memories of them.
because they know that they will see God defeat their enemies.
their kind deeds will endure forever,
and they will be exalted and honored.
but they will disappear and die.
The wicked things that they want to do will never happen.
